dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui

Class WidgetFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.xform.AbstractWidgetDescriptions
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.WidgetFactory

  • public class WidgetFactory
extends AbstractWidgetDescriptions
    This is the WidgetFactory class which handles widget creation as well as registration of custom widgets to the framework. If a custom widget, that was not created by this factory shall be used, it has to be registered at the factory for databinding and error handling purposes: 
     MyCustomWidget customWidget = new MyCustomWidget("WIDGET_ID", parentComposite);
 MyCustomController customController = new MyCustomController(customWidget, "MEMENTO_ID");
 factory.registerWidgetController(customController);
    Where MyCustomWidget implements ISWTWidget and MyCustomController extends AbstractWidgetController.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2008.b

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WidgetFactory.ButtonFlags
      ButtonFlags determine the style and behaviour of buttons.
      static class  WidgetFactory.GroupDecoration
      This enum represents the border decoration of a group
      static class  WidgetFactory.GroupLayout
      Determines the layout of the contents of a group.
      static class  WidgetFactory.TableFlags
      Provides flags that control various features of a table
      static class  WidgetFactory.TextFormat
      Determines the text format of the widget.
      static class  WidgetFactory.TreeTableFlags
      Provides flags that control various features of a treetable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WidgetFactory()
      This is the default constructor for derived WidgetFactories that are returned by AbstractBackend.doGetWidgetFactory().

      • doCreateController

        public AbstractWidgetController doCreateController(java.lang.String widgetId,
                                                   java.lang.String mementoId,
                                                   ISWTWidget widget)
                                            throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        This method is called by all create methods to create the controller of a widget.

        This method can be overridden to create a custom controller, e.g. to support a custom data model.

        This method must just create the controller but not register it with the WidgetFactory as this is already done by the create methods.

        Parameters:
        widgetId - the widget-id for the widget
        mementoId - the memento-id for the widget
        widget - the widget itself
        Returns:
        The controller (null in case of an error)
        Throws:
        dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Since:
        2009.a

      • addWidgetDescription

        public void addWidgetDescription(AbstractWidgetDescription widgetDescription)
        Add a new widget description to the list of register widget descriptions.

        Widget descriptions can be queried with doGetWidgetDescriptions(). This method is to be called by the constructor of the factory.

        Parameters:
        widgetDescription - The widget description to register
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doGetWidgetDescriptions

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AbstractWidgetDescription> doGetWidgetDescriptions()
        Allows to query descriptions for all widget types that can be created by this factory.

        This method returns a descriptions registered with addWidgetDescription(AbstractWidgetDescription).

        Overrides:
        doGetWidgetDescriptions in class AbstractWidgetDescriptions
        Since:
        2009.a
        See Also:
        AbstractWidgetDescriptions.doGetWidgetDescriptions()

      • createBrowser

        public SWTBrowser createBrowser(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                                java.lang.String widgetId,
                                java.lang.String mementoId,
                                java.lang.String text,
                                int horizontalSpan,
                                int verticalSpan,
                                int width,
                                int height,
                                boolean showHtml)
        Creates a label widget and adds it to the given parent Composite
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent Composite
        widgetId - the widgetId of this widget
        mementoId - the mementoId of this widget
        text - The HTML or plain text to show (null to query text from given memento)
        horizontalSpan - number of cells to occupy horizontally (if < 1 defaults to 4 for vertical and 1 for horizontal layout)
        verticalSpan - number of cells to occupy vertically (if < 1 defaults 1)
        width - number of pixels to occupy horizontally (if < 1 this is determined by the layout manager)
        height - number of pixels to occupy vertically (if < 1 this is determined by the layout manager)
        showHtml - if true the content is taken as HTML else as plain text
        Returns:
        the label widget
        Since:
        2009.a

      • createButton

        public SWTButton createButton(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                              java.lang.String widgetId,
                              java.lang.String mementoId,
                              java.lang.String text,
                              java.lang.String icon,
                              WidgetFactory.ButtonFlags flags)
                       throws dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Creates a label widget and adds it to the given parent Composite
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent Composite
        widgetId - the widgetId of this widget
        mementoId - the mementoId of this widget
        text - the text that shall be displayed on the button (null to show icon)
        icon - relative path to the base path set for the page where to find the icon (null to show text)
        flags - determines if this is a push or toggle button
        Returns:
        the button widget
        Throws:
        dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.internal.GuidedConfigException
        Since:
        2009.a

      • updateView

        @Deprecated
public void updateView(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> changedMementos)
        Deprecated. 
        Updates all widgets associated with the given mementoIds. If the parameter is null, then all widgets will be updated.
        Parameters:

        Since:
        2008.b

      • registerWidgetController

        public void registerWidgetController(AbstractWidgetController controller)
        Registers the controller of a custom widget to receive events from the guided config engine.
        Parameters:
        controller - the AbstractWidgetController to be registered
        Since:
        2008.b

      • unregisterWidgetController

        public void unregisterWidgetController(AbstractWidgetController controller)
        Unregisters the controller of a custom widget to not receive further events from the guided config engine.
        Parameters:
        controller - the AbstractWidgetController to be unregistered
        Since:
        11

                                              java.lang.String mementoPath)
